items.titolo: OpenAI, in arrivo una penna connessa a ChatGPT?
items.descrizione: OpenAI starebbe sviluppando una penna connessa a ChatGPT che digitalizza la scrittura a mano e integra funzioni AI locali. The post OpenAI, in arrivo una penna connessa a ChatGPT? appeared first on Punto Informatico .

items.titolo: 3 New Tricks to Try With Google Gemini Live After Its Latest Major Upgrade
items.descrizione: Google's AI is now even smarter, and more versatile.

items.titolo: Dev uses Claude AI to write a ‘functional NES emulator’ — you can test it now, playing Donkey Kong in your browser
items.descrizione: A developer has succeeded in prompting Claude to write 'a functional NES emulator.'

items.titolo: How DeepSeek's new way to train advanced AI models could disrupt everything - again
items.descrizione: The Chinese AI lab may have just found an approach to training frontier LLMs that's both practical and scalable, even for more cash-strapped developers.
